title: What is Superman's most advanced tech? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is what I know from memory, not gonna do some deep research because there’s a whole bunch of crap in that Fortress of his. He has a super-computer that connects to every other computer in the world.  A machine that seems to be able to cure any disease in the world. Why do I say this? Because he’s the first person to cure Joker venom (before Batman), and Joker venom is pretty much a death sentence back in the pre-crisis days. So this one is probably the most impressive if you ask me.  A machine that can give him powers if the sun blacks out or something similar happens  Bio Remediation Suit, a special suit/robot he built that slows the prevention of Kryptonian diseases, or will also take his place in case Superman dies.  He probably has a time-machine or dimensional traveling machine somewhere but it seems almost every superhero has one of those laying around.

Would be his home in the North Pole called: the Fortress of Solitude. Here he acquired and recreate some of the tech on his home planet through a Sun Stone (crystal) which came down to earth after Krypton went Boom! Also, know it was never adapted into the movies other forms of animated media… but Superman does own a Spaceship/Jet. I remember always watching it growing up on the Super Friends show.
